briefdescription.para: Places a vertex at the barycenter of its neighbors' position.
Uses information of the merging phase of the solar merger. Places a new vertex on the direct line between two suns.
Places the vertices in a circle around the barycenter and outside of the current drawing.
Places a vertex at the median position of the neighbor nodes for each coordinate axis.
Places a vertex at a random position within the smallest circle containing all vertices around the barycenter of the current drawing.
Places a vertex at the same position as its representative in the previous level.
The placers available in OGDF.
Based on the matching merger. Computes an edge cover such that each contained edge is incident to at least one unmatched vertex. The cover edges are then used to merge their adjacent vertices.
Based on the edge cover merger. Avoids distortions by checking whether biconnectivity will be lost in the local neighborhood around the potential merging position.
Vertices are partitioned into solar systems, consisting of sun, planets and moons. The systems are then merged into the sun vertices.
Uses a maximal independent set filtration. See GRIP for details.
The mergers available in OGDF.
Absolute factor, can be used to scale relative to level size change.
Scales by a factor relative to the average edge weights.
Scales by a factor relative to the disired edge length.
Scales by a factor relative to the drawing.
The scaling types available in OGDF.

memberdef.type: std::tuple< std::vector< float >, std::vector< float >, std::vector< uint32_t >, std::vector< uint32_t >, GraphProperties >
memberdef.definition: std::tuple<std::vector<float>, std::vector<float>, std::vector<uint32_t>, std::vector<uint32_t>, GraphProperties> LayoutFromLSHForest
memberdef.argsstring: (LSHForest &lsh_forest, LayoutConfiguration config=LayoutConfiguration(), bool create_mst=true, bool clear_lsh_forest=false, bool weighted=false)
memberdef.name: LayoutFromLSHForest

briefdescription.para: Genereates coordinates, edges and properties of a MST (via a kNN graph) from an LSHForest instance.

parameterdescription.para: An LSHForest instance which is used to construct the kNN graph.
Whether to create an MST before laying out the graph.
Whether to clear the LSHForest after it's use (might save memory).
Whether the LSHForest instance contains weighted MinHash data.

memberdef.argsstring: (LSHForest &lsh_forest, uint32_t k, uint32_t kc=10, bool weighted=false)
memberdef.name: MSTFromLSHForest

briefdescription.para: Generates an MST (via a kNN graph) from an LSHForest instance.

parameterdescription.para: An LSHForest instance which is used to construct the kNN graph.
The number of nearest neighbors used to create the kNN graph.
The factor by which k is multiplied when retrieving nearest neighbors.
Whether the LSHForest instance contains weighted MinHash data.

memberdef.type: std::tuple< std::vector< float >, std::vector< float >, std::vector< uint32_t >, std::vector< uint32_t >, GraphProperties >
memberdef.definition: std::tuple<std::vector<float>, std::vector<float>, std::vector<uint32_t>, std::vector<uint32_t>, GraphProperties> LayoutFromEdgeList
memberdef.argsstring: (uint32_t vertex_count, const std::vector< std::tuple< uint32_t, uint32_t, float >> &edges, LayoutConfiguration config=LayoutConfiguration(), bool create_mst=true)
memberdef.name: LayoutFromEdgeList

param.type: const std::vector< std::tuple< uint32_t, uint32_t, float >> &

briefdescription.para: Genereates coordinates, edges and properties of a MST from an edge list.

parameterdescription.para: The number of vertices in the input graph.
An edge list in the form of [(from, to, weight)].
Whether to create an MST before laying out the graph.

briefdescription.para: Laying out an OGDF graph.

parameterdescription.para: The number of vertices in the graph.
An instance of a GraphProperties struct.

briefdescription.para: Functions used for generating graph layouts from LSHForest instances and edge lists.
